scripts.docker:network:dev:create: bash -c 'set -a; source infra/.env.server.dev; set +a; : "${APP_NETWORK_NAME:?APP_NETWORK_NAME missing in infra/.env.server.dev}"; docker network inspect "$APP_NETWORK_NAME" >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker network create "$APP_NETWORK_NAME"'
scripts.docker:application:dev:up: pnpm run setup:dev-env && pnpm docker:volume:fe-dist:dev:create && node ./scripts/compose-with-env.mjs --env infra/.env.server.dev --env infra/application/.env.application.dev -- docker compose -f infra/application/docker-compose.application.dev.yml --profile blue up -d
scripts.docker:application:dev:down: pnpm run setup:dev-env && node ./scripts/compose-with-env.mjs --env infra/.env.server.dev --env infra/application/.env.application.dev -- docker compose -f infra/application/docker-compose.application.dev.yml down
scripts.docker:monitoring:dev:up: pnpm docker:volume:nginx-logs:dev:create && node ./scripts/compose-with-env.mjs --env infra/.env.server.dev --env infra/monitoring/.env.monitoring.dev -- docker compose -f infra/monitoring/docker-compose.monitoring.dev.yml up -d
scripts.docker:monitoring:dev:down: node ./scripts/compose-with-env.mjs --env infra/.env.server.dev --env infra/monitoring/.env.monitoring.dev -- docker compose -f infra/monitoring/docker-compose.monitoring.dev.yml down
scripts.docker:gateway:dev:up: pnpm docker:volume:fe-dist:dev:create && pnpm docker:volume:nginx-logs:dev:create && node ./scripts/compose-with-env.mjs --env infra/.env.server.dev --env infra/gateway/.env.gateway.dev -- docker compose -f infra/gateway/docker-compose.gateway.dev.yml up -d
scripts.docker:gateway:dev:down: node ./scripts/compose-with-env.mjs --env infra/.env.server.dev --env infra/gateway/.env.gateway.dev -- docker compose -f infra/gateway/docker-compose.gateway.dev.yml down
scripts.docker:all:dev:up: pnpm docker:network:dev:create && pnpm docker:volume:fe-dist:dev:create && pnpm docker:volume:nginx-logs:dev:create && pnpm docker:infrastructure:dev:up && pnpm docker:application:dev:up && pnpm docker:monitoring:dev:up && pnpm docker:gateway:dev:up
scripts.docker:all:dev:down: pnpm docker:gateway:dev:down && pnpm docker:monitoring:dev:down && pnpm docker:application:dev:down && pnpm docker:infrastructure:dev:down
